alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 8:56AM PST until February 04 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley, mainly in and near Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur from now until 1 PM PST this afternoon, and then they will begin to decrease after that time.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
